
# VoguePay 
![voguepay](https://static.openfintech.io/vendors/voguepay/logo.svg?w=400&c=v0.59.26#w200)  

## General 
 
**Code:** `voguepay` 
 
**Name:** 
 
:	[EN] VoguePay 
 
**Status:** `active` 
 
**Description:** 
 
: [EN]  VoguePay is a managed payment processing platform which facilitates secure online and mobile payments across a wide range of industry sectors. VoguePay is positioned to be the foremost processor and facilitator for payments both within Nigeria and between Nigeria and the rest of the world.
